alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:42PM CST until January 29 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural land. At 42.0 feet, Water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 38.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 42.2 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob.
